醒.definition: to wake up; to be awake; to become aware; to sober up; to come to

醒世恆言.definition: Stories to Awaken the World, vernacular short stories by Feng Menglong 馮夢龍|冯梦龙[Feng2 Meng4 long2] published in 1627

醒悟.definition: to come to oneself; to come to realize; to come to see the truth; to wake up to reality

醒轉.definition: to wake up; to regain consciousness

醒酒.definition: to dissipate the effects of alcohol; to sober up
